mapper.select: select id, promotion_id, promotion_session_id, sku_id, seckill_price, seckill_count, seckill_limit, seckill_sort from sms_seckill_sku_relation where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_seckill_sku_relation(promotion_id, promotion_session_id, sku_id, seckill_price, seckill_count, seckill_limit, seckill_sort) values (#{promotionId}, #{promotionSessionId}, #{skuId}, #{seckillPrice}, #{seckillCount}, #{seckillLimit}, #{seckillSort})

insert into sms_seckill_sku_relation(promotion_id, promotion_session_id, sku_id, seckill_price, seckill_count, seckill_limit, seckill_sort) values
(#{entity.promotionId}, #{entity.promotionSessionId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.seckillPrice}, #{entity.seckillCount}, #{entity.seckillLimit}, #{entity.seckillSort})

insert into sms_seckill_sku_relation(promotion_id, promotion_session_id, sku_id, seckill_price, seckill_count, seckill_limit, seckill_sort) values
(#{entity.promotionId}, #{entity.promotionSessionId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.seckillPrice}, #{entity.seckillCount}, #{entity.seckillLimit}, #{entity.seckillSort})
on duplicate key update promotion_id = values(promotion_id), promotion_session_id = values(promotion_session_id), sku_id = values(sku_id), seckill_price = values(seckill_price), seckill_count = values(seckill_count), seckill_limit = values(seckill_limit), seckill_sort = values(seckill_sort)
mapper.update:
update sms_seckill_sku_relation
promotion_id = #{promotionId},
promotion_session_id = #{promotionSessionId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
seckill_price = #{seckillPrice},
seckill_count = #{seckillCount},
seckill_limit = #{seckillLimit},
seckill_sort = #{seckillSort},
where id = #{id}
